smurf_setup.util package¶

Submodules¶

smurf_setup.util.cryochannel module¶

smurf_setup.util.cryochannel.all_off(root)[source]¶

turn off all the channels quickly (hooray!)

Args:
root (str): epics root (eg mitch_epics)
smurf_setup.util.cryochannel.config_cryo_channel(smurfCfg, channelNo, frequencyMhz, ampl, feedbackEnable, etaPhase, etaMag)[source]¶

written to match configCryoChannel.m

Args:
smurfCfg (config object): configuration object (really, a dictionary) channelNo (int): cryo channel number (0 .. 511) frequencyMhz (float): frequency within subband (-19.2 .. 19.2) amplitude (int): ADC output amplitude (0 .. 15) feedbackEnable (0 or 1): boolean for enabling feedback etaPhase (float): feedback eta phase, in degrees (-180 .. 180) etaMag (float): feedback eta magnitude
smurf_setup.util.cryochannel.freq_to_subband(freq, band_center, subband_order)[source]¶

look up subband number of a channel frequency

Args:
freq (float): frequency in MHz band_center (float): frequency in MHz of the band center subband_order (list): order of subbands within the band
Outputs:
subband_no (int): subband (0..31) of the frequency within the band offset (float): offset from subband center

smurf_setup.util.smurftune module¶

class smurf_setup.util.smurftune.SmurfTune(name=None, cfg_file=None, data_dir=None, debug=False)[source]¶

Bases: object

generic class based on the MCE tuningData class

filename(suffix=None, nickname=None, ctime=None, absolute=False)[source]¶

create timestamped filenames in the output folder of this tuning run

Args:
nickname (str): user-readable name to append to the filename ctime (posix time?): current time, to track files absolute (bool): whether to return absolute path (or just filename)
get_cfg_param(key)[source]¶

get config parameter

Args:
key (str): configuration key to get
make_dirs()[source]¶

make the paths for the output and plot directories for this tuning run

run(args, no_log=False)[source]¶

run functions with current smurfTune object, logging outputs

Args:
args (any): arguments to run (fed to subprocess.call) no_log (bool): whether or not to log outputs
set_cfg_param(key, value)[source]¶

set config parameter. note: this will not change the actual config file

Args:
key (str): configuration key to set value (any): val to assign to the key
write_to_log(message, flush=False)[source]¶

Write a message to the logfile

Args:
message (str): message to write to the logfile flush (bool): whether to flush immediately
smurf_setup.util.smurftune.make_dir(directory)[source]¶

check if a directory exists; if not, make it

Args:
directory (str): path of directory to create
